website_summaries.verdict: In the sea of affordable, forgettable iPod speakers, the Logitech S715i is a beacon for those who prefer their music to sound great.
pros: The Logitech S715i portable speaker for iPhone and iPod uses eight drivers to deliver audio performance that is far beyond its price range
cons: Lacks common extras such as FM radio, clock, and EQ

customer_reviews.title: Speakers "Clip" At Moderate Volume
customer_reviews.text: Waste of $100.00! Let me first say that I'm not in the category of folk who likes punishing loud music and I also understand the limitations of speakers to volume. This dock is ridiculous however. The speakers will "clip" at volumes exceeding approx. 30% of their capacity. WTF? Granted, I bought this used as "very good" and for the first month it was o.k. but to clip at low volumes is totally unacceptable. I have NEVER cranked the volume even once (or by accident) to cause damage that would allow this. Stay clear folks.
customer_reviews.author: woodsman

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding purchase, 7 YEARS later!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Bought this in 2010 for $149 and kept it in my bathroom to jam out in the shower. Took it to the beach for several years and just in general abused it on highest vol setting. Today the right speaker blew, so I threw it out...however I can't say enough about the quality from this lil guy for nearly 7 years. Had to come on and write a review as logitech clearly deserves some recognition. Used a Google Chromecast w it so beamed music too it...great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Kublin

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE sound quality, Incredible bass and quality
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express how miraculous these speakers are, I have had them for a long time it is 2019, and Ive tried the latest and greatest newer speakers in the market and they are "ok" compared to these, these are ridiculously powerful and clear, and very very loud. I WISH logitech would have a very similar model/look and quality just maybe Bluetooth version of this one, i would pay the $ whatever it would be for it. I keep returning other Bluetooth speakers I have tried because they suck compared to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy M.

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The unit made a cracking sound at more than 50% volume. A real disappointment, as I had the same model, purchased at least ten years ago, and it lasted until recently before something happened that caused the sound to die when the iPod was jarred or wiggled even slightly. MY first unit had excellent sound quality for the money, so I felt confident buying another. I hope this was a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence S.

customer_reviews.title: My family and I like this little dude and get a lot of use ...
customer_reviews.text: My family and I like this little dude and get a lot of use out of it. We wanted it to replace a large shelf-style boom box system...the three piece unit with a main section and two separate speakers. The boom box just looked like it belonged in a college dorm room instead of our living room. This little guy is so small and plain that it doesn't look out of place. It takes up very little space and is easily portable. It might not play as loud as the boom box but sound quality is better. For our use of mostly inside the home or occasionally outside on the deck at a small barbecue, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Davis

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: this radio is not blue tooth , sound quality is alright, if your looking for volume forget it But worst of all I purchased for my ipod witch its suppose to be compatable with . It is not When you plug in ipod it says this devise is not compatable and then it shuts off
customer_reviews.author: sanman18

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: The used product was described as "very good" but, I had to replace the 3 pin battery pack and the charger cord. Now it works! The two remotes in the box do not work. I suppose the batteries are bad and need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Tdeur1

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Just as outstanding as all the rest of the reviews on this high-fidelity "boom box" confirm. It is probably not the loudest thing on the market but the full bass extension and impressive fidelity at all frequencies is like a medium loud home stereo system. Sadly no longer being made but if you can snag a gently used one for a good price do not hesitate for a minute. I've had mine for at least 4 years and totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mediafreak

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality still beats the competition
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Oontz Angle 3 this month to replace my Logitech S7 15i. The Logitech blows away the Oontz. My Logitech is 5 years old and is incompatible with my phone. And there are so many rave reviews about the Oontz that I figured it had to be better. Nope. I plan to return the Oontz and buy an adapter for the Logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Heather0257

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, small size
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker system sounds absolutely amazing. It is a docking station for iPhones prior to the 5 series, and also has an aux input for MP3 players. The remote works well from across the room. Just a few annoyances that make it miss a perfect rating, none that make me regret purchasing this unit: -My iPhone has to be removed from its case in order to dock. -MP3 players cannot be used while an iPhone is docked. -Bass is reduced when on battery alone, but this is to prolong battery life. No deal killers there, no regrets here.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Grenigas

customer_reviews.title: mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: At first, the Logitech speakers seemed wonderful. They had a great tone quality, and you could really hear the bass if it was plugged in to the wall. However, within two weeks the battery had given out, and now it must be plugged in to work. The sound quality has gradually declined over the year since I've had it, and now it has mediocre clarity and balance, resembling the sound quality of my 1990's computer speakers. The remote has always been finicky, only working from a distance of about 10 feet, and only if it's pointed at the speakers in just the right way.
customer_reviews.author: S.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound for Very Little Money
customer_reviews.text: Portable and Chargeable iPod Dock that plays fairly LOUD and surprisingly good sound. It plays a little less loud when not plugged in the wall but still loud enough when outside. It doesnt play as well asor other higher end speakers but for the money I think it is great. Perfect for bringing to the beach, barbecues, the kitchen or wherever you want some music. I bought it used through amazon for a really low price and it was like new, and would reccomend it to anyone that wants a great ipod/iphone dock speaker without spending a ton of money.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Syvertsen

customer_reviews.title: Great sound when plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: After over a year of ownership the sound quality still amazes me as long as it's plugged in. When running on the battery it's still very good but a lot of the bass drops out. One caveat, it also doesn't last very long on battery power, particularly if you crank the volume. You might get a couple of hours out of it on moderate volume, less than that if it's louder. If you plan to use it a lot on battery power I would suggest purchasing an external battery such as the Anker® 2nd Gen Astro Pro, which plugs into the DC input on the back of the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Avodoc

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Battery FAILS.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with hopes of receiving a reliable, portable, and rechargeable boombox to bring on camping trips. It does sound very nice when its plugged in. However, it does not have the reliability or portability I was hoping for. The "rechargeable" battery lasts no longer than 20 minutes at any volume. There are way cheaper options available if you are looking for a portable and rechargeable unit. There are also cheaper options available for a stereo that stays plugged in. I am not sure why Logitech believes this device is worth $120. I wish i had bought a $50 portable bluetooth speaker instead. Now I know to stay away from Logitech for anything sound related.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Schatzeder

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, depends what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I got this boombox primarily for listening to outside. (pool parties, bbq's etc) First let me say the sound quality is excellent while plugged in but underpowered on battery power. I also noticed another problem , this device will overheat my iphone 4 while connected to an ac adapter. I had another iphone boombox prior to this and this never happened, so it was not my phone causing the problem. Lastly, the remote is worthless. I could get it to work about 5 feet away from the device, anything further and it simply would not work. Overall, for the price, I am not really dissapointed. It is a decent boombox but defenitely could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Eraser

customer_reviews.title: Logitech S715s Portable - If loving you is wrong, I don't wanna be right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my iPod, as I have a very specific playlist I'll be using at my retirement party. It's perfect! The sound quality is so much better than I expected for such a small piece of equipment. I had been putting off buying a portable speaker for a long time, but now that I have this, am sorry I waited so long. It will also be perfect to use while I'm on my exercise equipment at home - no more trying to keep those extra-long earbud wires from catching on things. I don't see how you could find anything better - especially for the price! Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speakers for the ipod
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth set of speakers I've had for my i-pod and by far the best. I've played a very wide variety of music on it (Johnny Cash to Elliot Carter, Simon and Garfunkel to Schoenberg, Miles to Messiaen) in several different settings (home and travel). I've been extremely happy with all of it. The sound is as full as can be expected from such small speakers and can fill a good size area. You obviously won't have the thumping bass you might want with dance music, yet it has more presence than I've heard from other similar speakers. If you need a set of portable speakers for your i-pod these are highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Trent P. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Crisp sound, great bass
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one ive bought, i am very picky about sound quality and didnt think anything for just over 100 dolars could deliver amazing sound but these speakers blew me away. The sound is crisp, clear, you can hear every single instrument, and the bass is surprisingly strong for a small speaker, usually youd expect that from something with a subwoofer. Also another bonus is the rechargeable battery, so the speaker works even when its unplugged right out of the box! Absolute great buy, amazing speaker! I am going to buy another one for a family member as a gift, which will make it 3 ordered in less than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Use it in the bathroom and the sound is pretty good. Reviewers are right when they say the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of a Bose because it had the pin that fits my IPod. Use it in the bathroom and the sound is pretty good. Reviewers are right when they say the volume and bass decrease when you use the battery as opposed to plugging it in a wall socket, but that doesn't bother me. I will say that placement is critical. Don't put it too close to a wall, experiment with placement. The hand held control didn't work when it came but all it needed was a new battery. Not quite the quality of sound as a Bose but pretty good and it's portable.
customer_reviews.author: robert a leo

customer_reviews.title: Battery recharge takes FOREVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is fine as an in home, keep it plugged in, docking station. For it's size the music quality is very decent, however. I purchased this to use as a PORTABLE docking station to use poolside and it was a BIG disappointment because as soon as the battery starts losing power, the volume drops dramatically and the battery takes forever to recharge. ON a positive side, it is very lightweight, & has better than expected sound quality. I would not recommend this as portable, unless you have access to an outlet or plan on using it for no more than three hours.
customer_reviews.author: M. Del Vecchio

customer_reviews.title: wonderful sound
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace the Logitech Pure-fi anywhere 2 we've had for 2.5 yrs. We were ready to replace it, as the volume down button cracked in half, and we lost the piece (so could only use the device or the remote to turn the volume down). I was hesitant to purchase this, as I think it is SO UGLY compared the the pure-fi anywhere 2. But the reviews were much stronger, so we gave it a go, and I'm SO GLAD we did. While I don't care for the look of it, and it is larger than the anywhere 2, the sound is incredible for the price. Buy it. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: L. Frazer

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Yes I still have an old ipod that I love because it has room for all the songs. (I make very large playlists and listen to music constantly.) I had a clock radio style speaker dock but the volume started getting weird, and it couldn't pretend to be stereo very well. So of course the sound on this Logitech speaker dock is better. I wish all the remote controls were also installed on the device itself. Remotes aren't something I want most of the time. Skirts don't have pockets for the most part, and I move around a lot. :shrug:
customer_reviews.author: H.L.

customer_reviews.title: Connection Problems/Poor Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Connection Problems/Poor Battery Life/Great Sound (only when plugged in wall outlet) Me and my buddy have both had this same unit for years. His always gave him connection issues (to iphone and ipod) and after about a year or so the built in battery could barely hold its charge. Mine started having issues connecting to my ipod after about 6 months. I have to tweak it with a paperclip to get it to work. The battery also does not last that long and the sound quality isnt great running off the battery. The good thing, when it is plugged in the wall and connected to an iphone the little thing rocks. Great sound...
customer_reviews.author: Tuna

customer_reviews.title: Nice low price options
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleasantly surprised by the quality from what's considered "lower end" box. I'm not a full stereophile but I do love my music clean, crisp minus the pounding bass. I have fairly high end home equipment but wanted something mobile and this is the unit I LOVE. I did some serious research/testing both internet and way TOO many store stops across the country and this is by far my favorite and would recommend to anyone. I take it from one room to the next and no problems. The ONE shortcoming is there's not much control over the screen, just volume, pause and advance but for $100.00, I will live with it.
customer_reviews.author: sales rep

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, and good looks
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have a pretty good sound, and the volume seems also right (I have only tried them with AC so far). My only complaint is that the volume control (both at the device and the remote) actually only control the volume of the iPod, not the volume of the dock. In other words, the dock itself doesn't have a separate volume, so when you press the volume buttons what it does is control the iPod internal volume. So far, no big deal, but with all other docks I've seen you can play with the iPod volume and then separately with the dock's volume. Not with this one.
customer_reviews.author: La Reya

customer_reviews.title: excellent /excellente
customer_reviews.text: increible producto suena muy bien tiene buen bajo buenos agudos y medios suena bastante bien tiene buen volumen no te va a retumbar toda la casa pero si suena lo sufieciente es bastante practico y sobre todo se puede llevar a cualquier lado gracias a su tamaño y su bolso para trasnporte .si los desenchufas suena aproximadamente la mitad que enchufada al toma corriente pero aun asi suena bien de verdad esto muy contento con el producto . great product !!! sounds its high quality ,good bass ,right size very practical the sound unplug is about the half with the plug in but still sound good enough
customer_reviews.author: alexrc

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound (over priced in todays market I think)
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it's a cool look speaker set up. It has adequate sound quality for the Logitech name. Pretty good volume, but nothing special. I'm frustrated right now with mine because I lost my charging cable and I can't find a generic replacement one that will work for it. I actually like the cheaper model of this speaker better. It comes with a better carry case, this one is made out of shopping bag material. The remote is handy, but just another part to lose. You can probably do better for the money if you look around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: T. Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: I compared numerous portable speakers on location at Best Buy and other places. This speaker system was definitely the best of the bunch. It's too bad it's a discontinued item, but there are still places to find it (as here at Amazon). It's a fantastic price and with 8 speakers, it sounds really good compared to others at a much MUCH higher price. It has good full base and decent mid and upper range sound. It's fullest sound is with the included AC adapter. When run on battery, the bass volume is reduced some, but still sounds super. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gfa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why I hadn't already purchased one of these but used a similar thing when we spent a couple of nights in a motel--came home and brought this one to put beside my bed. This has a really nice sound and is worth the price--you can get them cheaper but they sound like it, too!! My phone doesn't fit on the top because I use an otter box cover which is too thick. But I simply bought a Mediabridge 3.5mm Male To 3.5mm Male Stereo Audio Cable - (8 Feet) - and plug my phone in that way--I can also use my mp3 player this way!! Would recommend to others and would buy again myself!!
customer_reviews.author: gayle Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio
customer_reviews.text: I use this on job sites and it has so far stood up to the harsh work environments. Going on over a year it still thumps and people compliment it all the time. Its narrowness makes its easy to lug around with my tools. The built in battery makes it priceless for those of us that frequently work in places that have no power. Just keep in mind that when it is plugged in, it plays much louder and will charge some iphone models. Like any kind of battery, the cold will drain it so remember that before you decide to leave this in your car overnight during winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Not My Name

customer_reviews.title: the
customer_reviews.text: I really like this system. I do a lot of elliptical workouts and the ear buds were forever getting wet and malfunctioning. The sound is excellent and it is light weight and compact. I have had some problems with the "remote", changing/advancing songs and reducing/increasing the volume. Otherwise, this has been everything I had hoped for and I am thinking of getting another one for a different floor in my home. The price was $20.00 some dollars less expensive than the one at Best Buy...whom I don't do business with for other reasons. The price is very reasonable and delivery was the next day! Stephen Courts
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Courts

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This unit has fantastic sound...especially for the price. I read a lot of reviews, shopped around for a couple of months and this was, by far, the best sounding iphone dock in it's price range. Nothing else, except of course, for a $400 Bose portable Sound Dock, came even close to producing the rich, full sound of this unit. The only thing that could make it better is if it had some sound equalizing controls and the ability to place an iphone on the cradle without having to remove the iphone's protective case. ...but sound wise...this unit is a winner! ...even when played at low levels!
customer_reviews.author: Cycledance

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound from a small device. It doesn't handle a lot of bass well and there is no adjustment for treble or bass, so it just depends on the quality of your recording on your I-Pod. I am using an older full size I-Pod and it fits very snug with no wiggle and even stayed in when carried upside down with the I-Pod inserted (on accident of course). Overall..if you just need it in the house or a small to medium yard, it will be hard to beat this item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ENG12

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I got this product a while ago but that I can remember I loved how it worked. Sound quality was great and material was durable and strong. Sadly I got it stolen.... I would definitely recommend you purchase this speaker for all you people who love a good portable speaker. Battery life is great. A great BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juren Lopio

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The S715i is a great product. I researched quite a few systems like this and based from the other reviews made the decision to purchase this item. I am very pleased, the sound quality and overall quality of construction is great. This system is very durable and well built. It has also big sound for such a little box. I am not sure that you get all the battery life that is advertised but there is enough juice for a good afternoon or evening of music. As other reviewers stated, the sound quality is great unplugged from the ac jack but better when plugged in. I would imagine Logitech did this to conserve battery power. Good job Logitech
customer_reviews.author: Wired

customer_reviews.title: Sounds decent
customer_reviews.text: With all the good/great reviews here even comparing it with the Bose Soundock I was expecting more, not surround sound but more. It sounds decent while you dont play it loud. And Im not some crazy audiophile, just a guy who likes quality music. If its for soft music in the office, for reading, while talking with someone, that kind of thing, its good, buy it. But if you like your favorite rock song playing more or less loud, this is not the speaker for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sss

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this Speaker Dock!
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPod and an iPhone and only one small stereo in my long mobile home. I LOVE taking my music all over the house now! I have music in the kitchen, my exercise room, outside when I am working in the yard. The sound is Amazing and loud enough to hear wherever I am! I agree this is a GREAT piece of equipment for the price!! Also comes with a carrying bag too! My first purchase of an Amazon Warehouse item and I could not be more satisfied!! Great product, great service, great price!! A real Winner for me...so far!
customer_reviews.author: Morgine

customer_reviews.title: Nice low-cost portable powered speakers
customer_reviews.text: Even though the connection is for the old iPhone (doesn't work with iPhone5 or later) it's still a really good portable amplified speaker. Just use the mini-jack to connect your audio source and it gives you great sound and quite a bit of volume. I have used it as a portable PA system for a group of 30. The battery charge lasts for many, many hours.
customer_reviews.author: Wally S

customer_reviews.title: Works well with my iPhone 4S
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky enough to get this when there was a substantial discount, but was worried when I didn't see that it supported iPhone 4S models. I've been using this all day, it's great! You can use this with or without the included power supply, but when using the power supply, your phone will be charging at the same time as listening to your music. I will mostly be using this to check my mixes (as an audio engineer) to see how they will sound on small speakers like this. But don't be fooled by the small speakers though, they reproduce audio well and can get loud.
customer_reviews.author: Gunny T

customer_reviews.title: Good Product overall.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product. I had first tried the I-home and found the sound on this to be superior. One noticeable issue is the battery life and power output. The second you unplug, it looses sound output strength significantly. Also, the battery does not last very long at full blast, maybe 30 minutes. Other than that, good product! I recommend it! It is about $20-30 cheaper than buying it at Best Buy. December 1, 2012 UPDATE I am still using this product and with the exception of the battery which no longer works, it still works like the day I bought it. Good solid sound and I use it nearly everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: And The Winner Is......
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a 3 year old Klipch Igroove for the past 3 years & thought it sounded good. As soon as I plugged my 160GB IPOD Classic into the receptacle the clear sounds of my electronic trance music filled the air at a clarity most audiofiles would only dream of in such a small compact portable speaker system! All I can say is WOW & kudos to LOGITECH! Purchased from J&R using Amazon & it arrived via UPS Ground in 9 days. The included instructions advise that the internal ION battery takes about 4 hours to charge but this one was fully charged in less than 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: nvlystd

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Be Happier
customer_reviews.text: I pat myself on the back every day for treating myself to this speaker dock. Great size, great look and GREAT sound. Love the mobility of it...use it every single day and couldn't be happier...the much more expensive Bose docking systems I own don't even sound as good as this little LS715i...If I were to make one criticism, for best sound quality, you have to have it plugged in - EVEN when the battery is fully charged, the power is just not there. Maybe that is common with any player though.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Keeper

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, certainly convenient
customer_reviews.text: We don't use our speakers as much as we anticipated but they are decent for weekend trips and fill a small/medium sized room with decent/average sound. I used to own the iM7 bazooka, which was every bit as good as Boss, I can't say the same for these. The internal battery has decent life though, but on battery life sound quality is adjusted to extend play time and it's very noticeable. I'm not entirely disappointed with these speakers, just not overly thrilled with the sound quality, they're just eh.
customer_reviews.author: B. Downen

customer_reviews.title: What a Hoax
customer_reviews.text: This was such a mistake! I bought a second dock for my iPods and have been absolutely mystified by the positive reviews for this product. My little Altec (basic) has a tuner, better controls, better sound and is far more useful. THE WORST THING ABOUT THIS DOCK IS THAT IT ONLY WORKS WITH THE REMOTE (beyond turning it off and on and changing the volume. The remote is unreliable. I asked Logitech for another remote after even a battery replacement didn't help. The second remote didn't work at all, fresh batteries correctly installed. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Going strong after more than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker dock in May of 2012 and it's been following me around the house ever since. Plugged in and sitting on a wooden desk, it sounds rich and deep for its size and price. Crank the volume and the sound holds together well to a realistic point. Pull the plug and use the internal battery and it still sounds fine though volume and depth are diminished somewhat. Naturally it falls far short of a complete sound system but it does sound very good for a small portable, it's right for the price, it's convenient and dependable, it's well designed and I'm really happy with it. The remote works fine and it charges the phone while you rock out.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I know it doesn't have bluetooth or that its not the clearest sound. I just need it for my ipod classic. It gets the job done. Its loud and it charges my ipod. I can use it with the ac adaptor or off the battery. Not too heavy and a nice design. I know there are better sounding portable speakers out there. I'm just not paying $350+ for some portable speakers,,,,sorry dr. dre, jawbone, bose. It even comes with a small remote. I think the speakers are worth the price and then some.
customer_reviews.author: tony324

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable music
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase in the rechargeable iPod players. I've been very pleased. It sounds really good when plugged in. While on battery, it does lose a little bass. It's not bad, but i'm sure it's great for battery life. I can easily get 7 hours of nonstop music, as long as the volume isn't all the way up. I'd highly recommend this to anyone, and i'd buy this product again if something happened to my current speaker dock
customer_reviews.author: ChrisMac12

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with the sound of these speakers. I was looking at the Bose systems because I wanted good sound but they were just to expensive. I have always had good success with Logitech so I decided to give it a try. I have to say that the sound is surprisingly good especially at this price! You won't be dissapointed. I was a little disappointed at the performance when just under battery power. The bass is dimished but as said, Great bang for your buck! If the performance was better under battery power, I would have given it 5 stars. Very pleased though.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I stream music from online playlists and it also works with streaming stations as well as saved playlists from your phone. I will say this.....buy a dock extender if you have your phone in a case! Ours are in Otterbox cases and there's no way we could use this thing without the dock extender (it was like 2 bucks). It has great sound, a nice little remote, and I can hear it almost everywhere in the house. It's not a home theater or house party system, but for a small unit it rocks. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: bb625

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Found
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for playing my iPod in my office. I was so impressed with the sound quality that I purchased a second unit for use on our patio at home. Fantastic sound and very nice battery life. The included remote is a very nice feature. Not to worry about the remote if something happens to it. My absent mind left the remote in my pocket and ran it through the washing machine. Replacement item was $5.00 (plus s&h) from logitech and was delivered within 2 days. You can't go wrong with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: This thing has an incredible sound for a little machine!
customer_reviews.text: It gets bass like you wouldn't expect from something this size. I found reviews on CNET and Amazon that were nearly ALL great so when I found a refurbished item for $75, I couldn't pass it up. I've used it for my mobile massage service and it works great. I can plug it in or leave it unplugged. While the bass is reduced when it is unplugged, the sound quality remains. I personally like to leave it plugged in because I prefer the bass but I would be happy without it...maybe not for $75 but the sound quality is great either way!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: One Word- AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through different IPhone players and this one is by far the best for the price. The bass is impressive for the unit. I dont understand other reviews that report poor bass. It is not a floor standing sub. All tones sound good and there is not any tinniness. The 6 speakers provide a well rounded sound. I only wish it went louder, lol. Only con is when running on battery power, volume and tones are decreased. This makes sense to prolong battery power, but I would rather shorten the life of the battery than lose some of the sound.
customer_reviews.author: bridown

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and was expecting a fairly decent sounding portable player. The sound quality I would rate at about a 3 out of 10. My little computer speakers sound a lot better. Can't get much volume out of it either, I guess because if they gave it more volume the funky little speakers wouldn't handle it. I'm returning it. VERY DISAPPOINTING! I personally don't recommend this player.
customer_reviews.author: G. J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound when plugged in - Great sound when not!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our home to play ipod or Pandora on the iPhone and it works perfectly. The sound is full and rich and even though it sits in the living room the sound permeates the whole house with clarity when we want it to. We have also unplugged it and taken it to the pool, and while the sound is a little less "punchy" when unplugged, it still sounds amazing. The included case is great for taking it with you as well. We researched this one compared to Bose and Samsung players and this one was definitely worth the cost (which was way less than Bose). Very happy with our purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: iPhone Cradle in Stereo
customer_reviews.text: Before I moved to Yellowstone National Park (where I now live and work), I use to own an Ascend 5.1 surround sound system (about $2500). When I bought this portable Logitech iPhone audio system I compared it to every system in Best Buy. I had no idea how much I would enjoy it. I just put my iPhone on Pandora or iTunes (Music) and it always sounds great. It has amazing bass and balance and I don't have to do anything but change songs or turn it up or down. I've had it for ten months now with no issues, (not to mention that fact that its a cool looking portable unit!) I just bought my daughter one too! Mark
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I'm super delighted with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm super delighted with this purchase, I love the equipment, its sound, its shape, I've really enjoyed it, it's one of the best gifts I've made myself lol
customer_reviews.author: Rolando F.

customer_reviews.title: Great experience!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping! Quality product! Just what we needed and the sound quality is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie T.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great value
customer_reviews.text: My son has one of these in the living area of his apartment, and it has such good sound I decided to buy one for myself for my ipod. I love it. It has great sound, and the battery lasts quite awhile, so I can use it anywhere without worrying about getting electrocuted (e.g. in the bathroom while putting on my makeup in the morning.) I would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Baylor Mom

customer_reviews.title: good sound for size
customer_reviews.text: This small unit has surprisingly decent sound paired with my IPod classic. The reason it isn't worthy of a 5 star rating is the shortcoming of the internal rechargeable battery. When operating unit with battery power the bass response is severely throttled,presumably to extend battery run time.(which btw is pretty short). If you are using this primarily to run off an electrical outlet you will be pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: tcstom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and form factor
customer_reviews.text: This speaker system from Logitech produces excellent sound. It comes with a built in battery, a charger, and a cloth carrying case. The battery life and sound are excellent. It includes an iPod dock and a separate line in port to attach non-iPod music sources. My only complaint is the carrying case. It is very thin, and offers no protection from impact. I'm not a big fan of proprietary, non-replaceable battery packs, and I'm pleased to report that this one IS easily replaceable (but still proprietary).
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: I use my iPhone streaming Pandora and works wonderfully. The sound is crisp and clear compared to the size of the speaker. Nothing more to say here. Now the bad, The remote is too soft, a little harder buttons would have been better. Docking my iPhone is tricky. If I don't dock it in a straight line the speakers don't work. The docking is touchy, if I bump into the table the speaker is on mostly likely it will stop working and I have to re-dock the iPhone. My 2 cents.
customer_reviews.author: V. Challa

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech S715i is a great buy for the money. At low, moderate and even higher volumes it performs surprisingly well considering the price. It's only when you max out the sound that some distortion can set in. It is a terrific traveling companion--lighweight, easy to pack and has impressive battery life.Trust me you will be very impressed by the sound quality and musical detail that is provided by this player. Oh and forget that MSRP of $149--Amazon will virtually cut that number in half!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not stay charged!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and only used it three times. Of course when I go to use it a fourth time it dies whenever I unplug it from the power source, thus making it NOT portable. I paid a lot money for this dock and it's ridiculous that it does not work already. And I cannot return it due to it being out of the return window. The battery should at least be covered under warranty, but of course they won't cover it. $115 in the garbage. And logitech wont even respond to my emails. Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: So good...I bought 2
customer_reviews.text: This little unit packs a very good wallop. I bought one for my wife and she loves it. It is easy to use with an IPod. She appreciates that because she is technologically challenged. The sound coming out of it was so good and clear that my daughter wanted one to replace her iHome set. My teenage daughter has tested the upper range of the volume and found it to be loud enough...that should indicate something. Now I am waiting on one of them to buy one for me!
customer_reviews.author: Igziabeher

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I am teaching Kindermusik and LOVE this device! It is light enough to carry around with me. The only thing I would want to change is the remote: the remote is too small and there is no way to put it on a cord around your neck. The sound quality is great. I use the box to transport it back and forth. Love the low battery light feature. When I first saw this sound dock it was $45. 5 days later when I bought it, it had jumped to $90. It is worth $100.
customer_reviews.author: Medora Jensen

customer_reviews.title: great dock, just wish I could dock my iphone 5 in it
customer_reviews.text: I love this portable speaker dock, but since I upgraded to an iphone 5 I have to use an external cord. It still works well and I use it all the time to listen to music or podcasts in the shower but I can't charge my 5 off of it. It has great sound considering the small size, I have been really impressed with the sound quality considering how light weight and truly portable this dock it. It is about 10" by 3" and has a nice crisp sound.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Salzberg

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as the Older Model
customer_reviews.text: This dock is not a good as the older Logitech dock. It does not last as long at the same volumes as the old one. Its awkward shaped and takes more room in a suitcase. It also comes with a mesh case instead of the more stable one in the old model which is kind of pointless. However, if I had not already bought the old model I'd probably really like it. I use it in my house and use the old model for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good portable audio system for my ipod touch, and I spent quite some time comparing products and prices. I have to say that I am really pleased with my purchase! I was looking for something light and portable with a good sound. I mean, what is the point of listening to good music on mediocre speakers? well, the sound is really astonishing and even better than I had expected! and it is also very nice to have a handy remote. I can listen to music quietly in my living room or have a loud party! Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Astounding quality of sound in the price point!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the astounding quality of sound in the price point! The sound has depth and richness. I play it in my office using my iPhone as a radio tuner. Since I have a protective case on my iPhone 4s, I connect this with a cable. This is also convenient so that I can talk on the phone without having to disconnect it from the speaker system. This is a steal at this price and I firmly believe you would have to pay several time more to exceed this quality of sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: good value, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Good value for cost. Have used it a few times and like the sound. First time the bass sounded a little artificial, but every use after that was fine. Maybe it was a bad streaming radio station or product was still cold from delivery. Only "bad" comment, which really isn't that bad, is that the product it a little smaller than I anticipated from the photo. Imagine a loaf of bread sliced longways and you get an idea of ths size of this.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best portable iPod speaker I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: These logitech speakers are by far some of the best I have ever owned. The best part is the built in support for any type of iPod or even iPhone. Other portable speakers come with small plastic templates that are supposed to provide the necessary support your device needs in order to spare it any stress from flopping around. These speakers have it built in and it works perfect. The sound from these speakers is very nice for the size and the included carrying case is extremely convenient. I debated weather or not to buy these but I am very happy with my decision after finally making it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our outdoor wedding with no power
customer_reviews.text: We are planning to have our wedding at a park this summer in an area that has no power. We've been trying to come up with solutions about how to handle the music, then realized that we could have all of it on our ipod as long. Wanting it to sound as good as possible, we did a ton of research on the best rechargeable speaker available for a tight budget - over and over again the Logitech S715i kept coming up, so we decided to make the investment. Took it out to the park and tried it last weekend - WOW, it sounded incredible! It will easily be able to be heard by our 100+ guests.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife because we are always on the go. This works great with an iphone (Pandora, etc) or with an iPod. As others have said you do lost a little bass when you unplug the unit and it is running only on batteries but it still sounds great!! For this price I don't think you can find a better unit. We tried several out at Best Buy and this sounded better than the one's that cost twice as much, BUT we ended up buying on Amazon...as always.
customer_reviews.author: RooRoo

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this iPod speaker for my husband for Father's Day. He was thrilled to get it and we're all enjoying it now. We've used it inside our house and outside. The sound is excellent and the battery lasts! He can also charge his iPhone or iPod while listening to music, which is nice. I hoped it wouldn't be bulky and large and it's not - a great size and very portable. My only wish is that the case that came with it would have been a box instead of a cloth case, but it is nice that there is a case for it.
customer_reviews.author: kjsanches

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great portability! The case I have on my phone is a thin silicone case, and it's a pain because the cradle the phone plugs into doesn't accommodate the case well. It will stop my music and I have to come push my phone back down. >=( Other than that, love it!!! Fabulous sound and I love being able to pick up the stereo and just carry it to a different part of my house w/o having to worry about the cord as it has a rechargeable battery in it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Good design, very good sound, so much potentials. But not reliable for portable use. Even after fully charged, this device doesn't last an hour outdoor playing songs from ipod. I gave it a try again for my sons birthday pary few weeks back. But same- it died within an hour. It does good job when hook to the power source but other wise total disappointment.I don't know if i had i received faulty device! DO NOT BUY IF YOU WANT TO USE IT AS PORTABLE USE.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous sound for such a small unit.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the big sound coming from such a small unit. I opted to get this instead of adding a dock to my Bose, and I'm sure glad I did. This thing is easily portable. My basement is 50' long, 35' wide with 10' ceiling and this thing fills the room easily with great sound. I don't think I could have made a better purchase for the money. I'm probably going to buy an additional unit for another location. This gets a two thumbs up and a big recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent System!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this just for his room and I figured why not take a chance. Well it was definitely worth it! This system thumps bass with the greatest of ease. There is no distortion even when cranked up high. He uses it all around and outside the house, during workouts, etc. I was surprised how really good this system was for the price so go ahead and get 1, you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: N'awlins Native

customer_reviews.title: These Speakers Have Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the reviews and had to buy the Logitech Speaker Dock. The music sounds great! It fits nicely on my bathroom counter. The little remote has an on and off switch, volume control, and will fast forward, pause, and replay. Even though it is small, it produces a big sound. I use it with my IPod. The music on my previous speaker dock sounded "tinny" and this speaker dock is so superior! I was very happy with the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: They have a great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had these speakers for quite a while now and they are still going strong. They have a great sound quality, and a pretty solid volume level they can reach. I've taken them to camping festivals and accidentally located them in a position where they kept getting splashed a bit with water (which I did not mean to do and moved them when I realized they were getting wet) but I still never had a problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Henry

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a number of ipod docks in my day and this is, by far, the best. The sound is perfectly balanced with an incredible mid-range and high end. It has adequate bass, but the best feature of this unit is the clarity and separation of audible range. You can hear every note. It can also pump out a volume deceptive to it's size. It is not for the heavy bass enthusiast, but would be ideal for a classical music fan for it's distinct crystal clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Barber

customer_reviews.title: Quite good iplayer.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend. It is as others described. A bit weak base on battery power, but that's to conserve power it seems to work too. The only complaint is the "case" is one of those flimsy synthetic mesh like covers. It is very thin and I would use only as a cover when packing in another travel bag. But the unit itself is very nice. Remote is a plus and works across a good distance - probably at least as far as claimed. It's better that a number of units in this price range I've seen in brick and mortar.
customer_reviews.author: renoman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of the Logitech S71Si is fantastic for the price. There are speaker systems with more add ons like radio, but I wanted speakers that would charge my iphone and play songs from my phone. The only drawback (4 stars instead of five) is a narrow throat so that you can't use a case on your phone, easily solved with an extension cord. The extension cord allows better acess to your phone anyway. The mini remote is a gem and is a must for accessing all of the functions such as random play. The Logitech S71Si is a bargain and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yukonjohn

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding, portable speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I have one of the original Logitech, battery and plug-in speakers for our ipods and iphone, and thought I'd try this newer version. What a difference! Superb sound and able to go surprisingly loud while still sounding great. Remote works fine, too. Nice not having to change out adapters for the different ipods we have - that part is pretty flexible. Careful though, this isn't really a 'small' speaker set - it does have some size to it, but again, worth it due to the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic for the iPhone
customer_reviews.text: The Logitec S715i Rechargeable Speaker is simply the best sounding portable speaker system you can buy for your iPod or iPhone. Compact and light, this system produces outstanding sound that is rich with ample bass. I have several systems for my three iPhones (two of which are now being used as iPods) and without a doubt, the Logitech System is by far the best in the $100-150 range. Of course, you can go higher end or lower end, but Logitech hits the sweet spot of superior sound, excellent value, nice design, and excellent utility with the s715i. If the production of incredible sound is your number one criteria, go for this system. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Martin J. Rafanan

customer_reviews.title: Big sound small package
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for use at the pool and beach not really expecting too much and was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the sound. This thing is suprisingly loud with great bass, mid range, and really holds a charge ( at least 6 hours ) I would recommend this speaker to anyone who loves to listen to music. The only thing I would change is with the remote it seems to stop working once you get about 15' from the speaker and every once and a while I have had to pull out the battery and put it back in to get it to start working.
customer_reviews.author: Acgonefishin

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality  not as described
customer_reviews.text: Remote control does not work. Possibly battery. Sound quality average , too much base causes reverb in speakers. Not as described. Disappointed especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: polly hathorn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this speaker for my ipod so I had something to listen to while at work. This allows my attention to be grabbed by coworkers and still be able to listen to music. It has unbelievable sound and very little distortion. I do recommend the speaker be plugged in if played loud. Houwever, the battery does last anywhere from 4 to 7 hours at low or medium sound. I would say the only thing this is missing is a leash to carry around leaving me hands free to do whatever. Overall, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I take this to work and camp to entertain the crowd. Sounds much better on AC power as that retains the bass sound. About the only thing smaller is Jambox, but that generally costs more. As others have noted, if it's not plugged in you loose the good bass sound. Unlike some competitors products, this one does not have bluetooth capability. Also as others noted, the carrying bag seems a bit cheap, but better than no protection at all.
customer_reviews.author: frog

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best sounding portable docking station. This is my second one. The only reason I didnt give it five stars, is because you have to use an adapter for he newer iPhone/iPod. It's not updated. But this goes on every vacation with me. It charges up each night and goes to the sand and sun for the day. Battery last about 5-7 hours. If other countries voltage may be lower so charge doesn't last as long.
customer_reviews.author: JULIE HUFFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Sounds much better than I expected, and with an 8 hour battery life, you can take it anywhere. I bought a refurbished unit, so for the price, you can't beat it. Only downside is there isn't a handle on the unit, or on the bag, but it is small enough to tuck under your arm, so......I also used a piece of velcro for the remote as it is pretty small and easy to misplace, so i have it stuck to the back of the unit, but other than that, what else do you expect from a company that makes such great products.
customer_reviews.author: Ga Boy-n-FL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sound
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our wedding to have music for the ceremony that was not near a power source. The sound was crisp and clear and loud enough for people to hear fine at about 60-70 ft. There was no distortion and the remote was handy. We now use this at home to listen to podcasts while making meals. I just wish it came with a AUX cord because one of us has a non-Apple product. There is an AUX port though.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: you aint gonna blast people outta their seats, but for workin on car in garage its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Little box with a great sound
customer_reviews.text: Logitech has come a long wwaayyy from being manufacturers of mouse and keyboards. They started making decent computer speakers and progressed making speakers with good quality sounds for the money. The Logitech S715I produces good music especially Classical music which is dynamic in it presentation from my Ipod classic. My desktop speakers are M-Audio AV40 considering they are two speakers system and produces good quality sounds and when I listen to Logitech S715S they sounds almost just as good as my M-Audio. The concept behind Logitech S715S is that it rechargeable and able to take it anywhere you go. I am a MUSIC LOVER and I thank Logitech for making a great product that fits my lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: KC in Keepcool

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a small package
customer_reviews.text: This item exceeded my expectations. Very well made, great sound. Once I plugged my Ipod into this, I called XM and cancelled my service. This little set is more compact than my XM boombox, has way better sound, and has an AC adapter and remote. One small con: No 12 volt cigarette lighter adapter was supplied. I picked one up locally (12V to 12V adapter). I use this in my boat, my camper, and even in my vintage car. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction.
customer_reviews.text: The remote quit functioning in less than a week, the dock quit charging my iPod in less than a month. It still plays fine and sounds good, but for the money spent I didn't expect it to fall apart THAT quickly. If you just want something to play music at a party, this will work, but if you were attracted to the remote control and charging station - spend more money on something else.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Remote issues fixed
customer_reviews.text: Great product, sounds great, works easily with my old iPhone 3. Had me worried when I couldn't get the remote to work straight out of the box:( didnt want to return the whole system for a silly remote but wanted the silly remote to work. I tried it all... battery installed the right direction?... check. New battery?... check. Reset the system by pressing and holding power button?... check. Yet, remote still wouldn't work. Until I adjusted the spring-y contact in the remote to the extreme... Then voila, works great! A paper clip to pull down the contact some more, then push the battery back in and remote works like it should:) Love the system for summer parties and pool time!
customer_reviews.author: Missy L

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good product, good sound. It can handle almost the entire volume range without distorting and it gets pretty loud. If your player has an equalizer, use it to fine tune the music to your liking. I was a little disappointed when I found that it didn't come with the 3.5mm male/male auxiliary cable for non Apple devices. The stupid thing is that EVERYTHING is made for IPOD/IPHONE so in order to charge your other mobile devices, you'll need a separate cable. The next model up from this one is a wireless bluetooth version. However, I didn't choose it because if its price.
customer_reviews.author: cv

customer_reviews.title: Very good speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound from a fairly small speaker dock. The battery lasts quite a while, but the sound level drops as the battery dies. It is noticeably louder when plugged in compared to when on battery, but it doesn't really bother me. The sound quality isn't as good as some other more expensive units, but for the price I think it sounds good. It has pretty good range. The bass is decent given the small size, and the high end is clear.
customer_reviews.author: David O

customer_reviews.title: Freaking epic speakers
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these speakers for around 3 months now, and let me tell you that they are nothing short of amazing. They're stylish and sound great. I've never had them run out of battery. The remote control is simple but works well. The included pouch is a bit on the lame side, but its ok. I frequently connect my laptop (Via AUX input) to them for movies, TV shows and games. I love being able to connect my iPhone via the AUX input to turn the speakers into a giant speaker-phone, which is useful for when the whole family is talking to a person on my iPhone. I would recommend these speakers to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: FirewaveZ
